Happy holidays ✨

Hey — it's me, Christina.

The decade is almost over, we made it! I don't know about you, but 2019 has been a whirlwind for me.

Here are a few of my highlights from this past year: we got a picture of a black hole, Billy Ray and Lil Nas X made us rethink what makes you country, there was a renewed focus on climate change, protests in Hong Kong are growing, Vine TikTok blessed us with so much good content, and Keanu Reeves was more relevant than ever.

With all that, I'd like to send you a holiday card. Let me know where to send it to and hopefully you'll get a card from me in the mail before Christmas Day.

Love,
Christina
